title: Associations between CAC scores and risk for CVD
content: This paper looked at “generally healthy middle-aged men” and associations between their level of aerobic fitness, CAC scores, and risk for CVD. People with a CAC of 0 (i.e., ZERO) had a 0.9% (CI: 0.6% to 1.3%) “hard event” (i.e., heart attack, stroke, death) rate.
